about_the_game:
You are a young, inexperienced, crew who wishes to travel through space. Having been warned of the dangers of space, you feel as if it could only be an over-exaggeration. With your trusty ship and friends, you understand why ships possess such large crews.
Luckily for you, it isn’t all that bad. Besides the onslaught of ships that wish to take you out, there is the galaxy’s greatest Space Store, Cosmo Convenience, ready for you and all your spaceship needs.

Gameplay:

Cosmos Crew: Astral Synergy is a First-Person, Proximity-Chat, Multiplayer game where you see how long you can survive through deep space.
Assign stations to your crew and hope they work well under pressure.
With up to three friends on your ship, you all take control of the various components that are required to run the ship. From aiming and loading the weapons in the weapons bay to refilling the oxygen tanks in the Oxygen bay.
Your ship will be attacked by various space pirates who want to stop you from progressing. You need to manage your crew as your ship gets onslaught by missiles.
You'll need to repair broken components and walls and put out fires damaging your ship.
Should you run out of ammunition, or lose important tools such as your fire extinguisher, luckily there is Cosmo Convenience there to help you.
Do what you can to survive for as long as possible, because those space pirates won't stop coming.

Story:

Load the weapons! Aim the Cannons! FIRE!
The lights have gone out. The door is on fire! I’m being sucked into space!
You and up to three friends start your adventure through space, communicating with your large ships' little communicators, trying to manage all the little components that make up your impressive ship.
From fixing the lights, refilling the oxygen, putting out fires and fixing the various components, your ship isn’t as easy as it first seems. Primarily, because space pirates are doing all they can to blow you up and steal the scrap from your ship.
Just how many sectors can you survive?
Just when will the ship stop being on fire?
When will the price of oxygen finally lower so you can pay for a full tank? 
All you know is the wisest words your mother told you before departing: “Don’t forget your magnet boots when repairing a broken wall.”

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Anything should work

Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything should work

short_description: Cosmos Crew: Astral Synergy is a First-Person Multiplayer Space Adventure. Many components on your spaceship require attention. You and your crew of friends must see how far you can survive and venture into space. Repair the lights, fix the doors, and load the weapons.
